valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 1 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 2 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Norwegian Sea 980 expected Baltic sea 973 by midnight tonight. New low expected 150 miles west of FitzRoy 986 by same time
